javacsw.services.cs.akka

Class JConfigServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacsw.services.cs.core.JConfigManager
      • javacsw.services.cs.akka.JConfigServiceClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigManager

    public class JConfigServiceClient
extends JConfigManager
    A non-blocking Java client for the config service

    param: client the scala implementation of the cs client param: context the akka actor context (system or context)

    • Method Detail

      • getFromConfigService

        public static java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<ConfigData>> getFromConfigService(java.io.File path,
                                                                                                          java.util.Optional<ConfigId> id,
                                                                                                          akka.actor.ActorSystem system,
                                                                                                          akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Convenience method that gets the contents of the given file from the config service by first looking up the config service with the location service and then fetching the contents of the file using a config service client. (Use only for small files.)

        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file in the config service
        id - optional id of a specific version of the file
        system - actor system needed to access config service
        timeout - time to wait for a reply
        Returns:
        the future contents of the file as a ConfigData object, if found

      • getStringFromConfigService

        public static java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<java.lang.String>> getStringFromConfigService(java.io.File path,
                                                                                                                      java.util.Optional<ConfigId> id,
                                                                                                                      akka.actor.ActorSystem system,
                                                                                                                      akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Convenience method that gets the contents of the given file from the config service by first looking up the config service with the location service and then fetching the contents of the file using a config service client. (Use only for small files.)

        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file in the config service
        id - optional id of a specific version of the file
        system - actor system needed to access config service
        timeout - time to wait for a reply
        Returns:
        the future contents of the file as a string, if the file was found

      • getConfigFromConfigService

        public static java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<com.typesafe.config.Config>> getConfigFromConfigService(java.io.File path,
                                                                                                                                java.util.Optional<ConfigId> id,
                                                                                                                                java.util.Optional<java.io.File> resource,
                                                                                                                                akka.actor.ActorSystem system,
                                                                                                                                akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Convenience method that gets a Typesafe Config from the config service by first looking up the config service with the location service and then fetching the contents of the given file using a config service client. Finally, the file contents is parsed as a Typesafe config file and the Config object returned.

        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file in the config service
        id - optional id of a specific version of the file
        resource - optional resource file to use in case the file can't be retrieved from the config service for some reason
        system - actor system needed to access config service
        timeout - time to wait for a reply
        Returns:
        the future config, parsed from the file
